subject: Fix transaction store and asset handling bugs
body:
- Fix transactions not appearing: add addOrEditTransaction() call in
  updateTransactionsFromFireblocks() to actually store fetched transactions
- Handle "Asset already exists" error gracefully in AssetsStore.addAsset()
  by continuing to fetch asset details instead of throwing
- Add debug logging for transaction fetching
- Update Phase 2 test statuses (Enable Asset, Deposit, Receive, History done)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Fix transaction store and asset handling bugs
